#2 Boku No Hero Academia
#3 One Punch Man
#4 Daily Life with Monster Girl

topics.body:
Anyone else think Arrow feels like they wanted to do a Batman show, but didn't have the right to Batman, so they took Green Arrow and just rolled with it?

Also.

There should be a TV MA Batman show. Not a prequel like Gotham or sorta sequel like Birds of Prey. But full on adult Batman show. The time is rife for it and the character is perfect for the format.
